item.title: PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds is ruling Steam with record-breaking player count
item.dc:creator: Swikrit Thapa
item.description:

PlayerUnknown’s Battleground has set a new record with the highest number of concurrent players for any game ever on Steam.One week after surpassing one million consurrent on Steam, Playerunknown’s Battlegrounds has now set all-time record for concurrent users .
